title: Re-roll what??
body:
So I have three legacy skins in my loot inventory: Butcher Urgot/Major Ziggs/Sailor Gangplank, and we all know when we re-roll we usually get a permanent skin for something we own, so I did this in hopes for something good for a champion, and I get Blade Queen Lissandra I get excited then confused cause I don't own lissandra, I go to my collection, and nope don't own lissandra and now I just have a skins shard....

Please Help

replies.body:
Go back and check. It's shouldn't be a skin shard, but rather a _skin permanent_. 

That is, when you get Lissandra, you can right click on the skin permanent and unlock it for her. But until you do that it won't show up as a usable skin.
